  2. Google’s new AI tool uses image prompts instead of text  CNN
  3. Google's AI video generator blows OpenAI's Sora out of the water. YouTube may be a big reason.  Business Insider
  4. Google's Veo 2 video generator takes on Sora Turbo - how to try it  ZDNet
  5. Google DeepMind's new Veo 2 AI video generator trounces OpenAI's Sora with 4K resolution  Fortune

item.title: Lockheed forms subsidiary to help defense companies adopt AI - Reuters
item.description:
1. Lockheed forms subsidiary to help defense companies adopt AI  Reuters
  2. Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) Wants to Get More Militaries into AI  TipRanks
  3. Lockheed Martin Adds IBM Granite to its Suite of Next-Generation AI Factory Tools  IBM Newsroom
  4. Lockheed Martin Creates Subsidiary Focused On Secure AI Solutions For Defense, Commercial Sectors  Defense Daily Network
  5. New Lockheed Martin Subsidiary to Offer Machine Learning Tools to Defense Customers  ExecutiveBiz
